title: Zone of the Enders: Dolores, I (Zone of the Enders: Dolores)
synopsis: 49-year-old James Lynx was an officer (LEV pilot) in the United Nations global army, one day he received notification that his wife—a Martian scientist—was killed during a lab experiment.
